definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: This raises the question of whether the beneficial results of warfarin can be extrapolated to persons of colour.
sentences.chinese: 這引發疑問，華法林的治療獲益能否外推到有色人種？

sentences.english: Use caution with individuals taking warfarin or other blood thinning medications.
sentences.chinese: 謹慎使用與個人服用華法林或其他血液稀釋藥物。

sentences.english: Examples of such drugs include, in particular, tramadol and warfarin.
sentences.chinese: 這類藥物的例子包括尤其是曲馬朵和華法林。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of left atrial appendage thrombi resolution after anticoagulation with warfarin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討華法林溶解左心耳血栓的機制。
